# llms.txt
# AI-Characters.org - Your comprehensive guide to AI character and companion platforms

# Site Information
> ai-characters.org (Character Central)
> Expert reviews and comparisons of 21+ AI character platforms
> Updated: January 2025

# What We Do
We provide comprehensive, unbiased reviews of AI character and companion platforms. Our mission is to help users discover the best AI platforms for their needs through detailed comparisons, expert insights, and honest reviews.

# Main Categories

## Premium AI Platforms
- Lovescape: Next-generation AI companions with advanced features
- Nomi.ai: AI companions with selfies and voice messages
- Kindroid: AI companions with long-term memory
- Character.AI: World's largest AI character platform

## Romance & Dating
- Crushon AI: NSFW-friendly character platform
- DreamGF: Customizable AI girlfriend with images
- Candy AI: Virtual companions with anime styles
- Romantic AI: Specialized romantic relationships

## Mental Wellness
- Replika: AI companion focused on mental health
- AI Mirror: Introspective AI for personal growth
- Paradot: AI with emotional intelligence

## Community Platforms
- Janitor AI: User-created characters
- Chai AI: Thousands of community personalities
- Poe: Multiple AI models in one place

## Developer Tools
- Inworld AI: Professional-grade AI for games
